page.title: 05RECTORY PARK SUTTON C'FIELD
page.content: We{interviewed}eleven people and asked them questions about{Rectory Park. } Seven people came to walk their dogs three people came for a stroll,and one visitor had come to watch a game of cricket. Most people chose Rectory Park because it is more convenient than the much larger{Sutton Park.}It is also believed to be more peaceful and there is less litter strewn about. Only two visitors thought the Park wasn't{safe}and that was at night due to gatherings of youths.Also there have been some attacks on girls. Everyone thought there were enough {amenities.}There are toilets which are vandalised but clean.The lock on the Ladies toilet is on the outside! The Pavilion is open to Sports Club members and refreshments can be bought when there is a cricket match.
